title: VMware security advisory (AV25-357)
description: On June 18, 2025, VMware released security advisories to address vulnerabilities in the following products:
products: VMware Tanzu Data Lake  versions prior to 1.1.0
VMware Tanzu for Postgres on Kubernetes  versions prior to 4.1.0
VMware Tanzu for Postgres on Kubernetes  versions prior to 4.2.0
VMware Tanzu for Valkey on Kubernetes  versions prior to 1.1.0
VMware Tanzu for Valkey on Kubernetes  versions prior to 2.0.0
VMware Tanzu Greenplum  versions prior to 6.29.1
VMware Tanzu Greenplum  versions prior to 7.5.0
VMware Tanzu Greenplum  versions prior to Backup and Restore 1.31.1
VMware Tanzu Greenplum Command Center  versions prior to 6.14.0
VMware Tanzu Greenplum Command Center  versions prior to 7.4.0
VMware Tanzu Greenplum Data Copy Utility  versions prior to 2.8.0
VMware Tanzu Greenplum Streaming Server  versions prior to 2.1.0
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
